title: Search results not selected in external jar
description: When searching for references to a field in an external jar (Build 200201151), the first match is not selected. This issue occurs when using JDK1.3.1 as the default JRE and having the source for rt.jar.
OB: When double-clicking on the search result, the first match is not selected.
EB: When double-clicking on the search result, the first match should be selected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
 1. Set JDK1.3.1 as the default JRE. 
 2. Ensure that you have the source for rt.jar. 
 3. Open the java.io.File class. 
 4. Select the field 'tmpFir'.
